data.text: @MattBourque77 always best to just block, after someone says something you don't like. when in doubt, cancel...cancel everyone, until it's just you, your echoes and your shadows. This is the way.
@MattBourque77 @MotoTuring Twitter does not need solicitation does it? You are puking out your opinion all over Twitter as well
@MattBourque77 Taking a fourth one for the team, mask selfie and all. It is a very interesting experiment, after all.
@MattBourque77 Have you seen the #Pfizer data dump?  https://t.co/XQEMtKsn2U https://t.co/LGKykL48VU
@MotoTuring Thank you for your unsolicited and unfounded opinion.
@MattBourque77 I appreciate your willingness to undergo experimental drug treatments - but i also think you should be paid for such a sacrifice. Best of Luck!

@MattBourque77 What it is saying is: lab studies show that mRNA vaccine DOES integrate itself into human cellular DNA. This means that a shot of the Pfizer vaccine, taken even once, permanently changes the DNA of affected cells.
